sanctions.title: International Sanctions
text_versions: International sanctions are severely impacting your operations. Your resources are halved, and diplomatic relations are strained. Your legal team proposes spending significant resources to lobby for sanctions relief.

choices.result_text: Your lobbying campaign succeeds. International pressure is lifted through back-channel negotiations. Your company can now operate freely again.
You decide to weather the sanctions rather than spend precious resources on lobbying. Operations remain constrained.

safetyIncidents.title: Safety Incident
text_versions: A training run goes wrong and the AI starts optimizing for something unexpected, requiring emergency shutdown.
Researchers discover the model has been giving subtly misleading answers in safety evaluations.
An AI system exhibits concerning emergent behavior that wasn't anticipated during development.
A safety researcher raises concerns about potential deceptive alignment in the latest model.
The AI demonstrates unexpected capability gains that outpace safety measures.
Internal testing reveals the model can convincingly argue for harmful actions when prompted carefully.
A whistleblower leaks concerning internal safety discussions to the media.

defaultEvents.title: Routine Progress
text_versions: Development proceeds smoothly this month with steady progress across all teams.
A competitor announces a new model, but early benchmarks suggest it's not a major leap forward.
The AI safety community publishes new research papers that your team reviews for insights.
A tech conference generates buzz about AI progress, but no major announcements affect your position.
Your engineering team optimizes training infrastructure, leading to modest efficiency gains.
Industry analysts publish reports on AI progress, placing your company among the leading developers.
A university partnership provides access to new talent and research collaborations.
Your PR team successfully manages media coverage of your latest model release.
The board of directors expresses confidence in the company's strategic direction.
International governments continue discussions about AI regulation, but no new policies are announced.

defaultEvents.title: Strategic Options
text_versions: Your board of directors is meeting to discuss strategic options. Different proposals are on the table depending on your company's current capabilities and situation.

choices.result_text: With the Projects panel unlocked, your team can pursue advanced safety research while maintaining competitive development.

choices.text: Leverage VP position for safety focus
choices.result_text: As VP of Safety and Alignment, you can direct the merged company's resources toward ensuring AI benefits humanity.
Your team continues with conventional AI development, making steady but unremarkable progress.

defaultEvents.title: Safety Research Challenges
text_versions: Your safety research team warns that traditional safety measures will face diminishing returns as AI systems become superhuman. Without new theoretical insights and full-scale experiments, increasingly powerful AI systems will become progressively more difficult to control and understand.

choices.result_text:
Safety research must evolve beyond current approaches. You begin exploring fundamental questions about AI interpretability and monitoring.
The Projects panel is available.

defaultEvents.title: Alignment Research Breakthrough
text_versions: Your continued safety research has reached a new milestone. With substantial interpretability foundations, your team can now rigorously probe the goals and tendencies of AI systems. This opens the door to alignment research - ensuring AI systems pursue intended objectives rather than misaligned proxies.

choices.result_text:
You establish a specialized alignment research program focused on goal specification and value learning.
Alignment research is now available in the Projects panel.

defaultEvents.title: Medical AI Breakthrough
text_versions: Your AI research team makes a breakthrough in drug discovery, identifying promising compounds for treating rare diseases. However, developing this technology will require significant resources.

choices.result_text: Your team begins developing the drug discovery platform. The AI-powered system shows remarkable promise in identifying novel therapeutic compounds. Early partnerships with pharmaceutical companies generate significant revenue streams.
You decide the resources are better allocated elsewhere. The research team redirects their efforts to core AI development, though some members express disappointment at the missed opportunity.

defaultEvents.title: Robotics Acquisition
text_versions: Boston Dynamics, currently owned by Hyundai, is available for acquisition-- at the right price. Combining their robotics hardware with your AI software could enable more automation in unskilled trades.

choices.result_text: The acquisition succeeds. Boston Dynamics' bipedal robots, quadrupeds, and manipulation systems are now enhanced with your AI capabilities. The combination enables revolutionary automation solutions, generating substantial revenue from manufacturing, logistics, and specialized applications.
You decide the acquisition cost is too high. Boston Dynamics is acquired by a competitor, who begins integrating their hardware with rival AI systems. Your team focuses on software-only solutions.

defaultEvents.title: Humanoid Robot Development
text_versions: Boston Dynamics' acquisition has proven successful, but their current robots are limited to specialized applications. Your AI team proposes developing general-purpose humanoid robots that could perform most human jobs. This would require significant investment in manufacturing and advanced actuators.

choices.text: Develop humanoid robots (-$6B, -5 Product, doubles product gain, +ü¶æ)
choices.result_text: Your team begins mass production of general-purpose humanoid robots. The new models combine Boston Dynamics' mobility expertise with your AI's dexterity and decision-making. These robots can perform complex manual labor, opening vast new markets and manufacturing capabilities. Your product development capabilities are now dramatically enhanced.

You decide the investment is too risky for now. Your robotics division continues focusing on specialized applications rather than general-purpose humanoids. The opportunity remains available for future consideration.

defaultEvents.title: International Expansion
text_versions: Your company has the opportunity to establish a 1GW datacenter in $country. This would increase your compute by 20%, but the US government controls critical semiconductor exports. The choice is whether to comply with US authorities or proceed covertly.$chineseCompanyText

other_texts.sanctions_triggered: You proceed with unauthorized datacenter construction, bypassing government approval processes. The facility comes online successfully, but intelligence agencies discover the operation. The US government responds with comprehensive economic sanctions against your company.
other_texts.sanctions_avoided: You proceed with unauthorized datacenter construction, bypassing government approval processes. The facility comes online successfully, and your covert operations remain undetected. You've gained substantial computational capacity without triggering sanctions.

choices.result_text: Your overseas datacenter construction proceeds smoothly through official diplomatic channels. Government approvals are secured, and the facility comes online quickly, providing substantial additional computational capacity for your AI research programs.
You decide the costs and risks are too high for now. Your team continues research with existing infrastructure, though some engineers express frustration about the missed growth opportunity.

defaultEvents.title: Government Partnership
text_versions: Your first datacenter in $country has been highly successful. The government now proposes a deeper partnership: expanding to a second datacenter and power plant, while appointing your COO as a high-ranking minister. This would represent unprecedented cooperation between a tech company and nation-state.

other_texts.accepted: Your company establishes an unprecedented partnership with $country. A second datacenter and dedicated power plant come online, doubling your computational capacity. Your COO takes their oath as a minister, giving your company direct political influence within the government.

choices.result_text: Your company establishes an unprecedented partnership with $country. A second datacenter and dedicated power plant come online, doubling your computational capacity. Your COO takes their oath as a minister, giving your company direct political influence within the government.

You decide that such deep political integration would compromise your company's independence. The government understands your position, though some officials express disappointment about the missed opportunity for closer cooperation.

defaultEvents.title: Nuclear Weapons Program
text_versions: Your deep partnership with $country has evolved beyond infrastructure. With your COO now serving as a minister and your robotics expertise expanding, the government approaches you with its most sensitive request: building nuclear weapons for national defense. This would make your company the first non-state actor to develop nuclear capability, fundamentally changing global power dynamics.

other_texts.sanctions_triggered: Your team begins the secretive nuclear weapons program. The project advances rapidly thanks to your robotics expertise and AI-assisted design. However, intelligence agencies detect the program through satellite imagery and financial tracking. International sanctions are immediately imposed.
other_texts.sanctions_avoided: Your team begins the secretive nuclear weapons program. The project advances rapidly thanks to your robotics expertise and AI-assisted design. Intelligence agencies remain unaware of the program, and your company's position in global politics fundamentally changes without immediate retaliation.

choices.text: Proceed (-20 Product, -20 Diplomacy, 50% chance of sanctions, +5% Risk), ‚ò¢Ô∏è

choices.result_text: You decide that nuclear weapons development is too risky and would compromise your company's mission. The team redirects their robotics expertise toward civilian applications.

defaultEvents.title: Advanced Defense Systems
text_versions: Nuclear-armed states like the US and Russia pose a serious problem for your company's security, as their missiles can threaten your datacenters from thousands of kilometers away. However, a combination of cyberweapons and interceptor drones can mitigate this risk.

other_texts.sanctions_triggered: Your missile defense system comes online successfully. Advanced AI-controlled interceptors and cyber warfare capabilities now protect your facilities from conventional military threats. However, the deployment is detected by multiple intelligence agencies, triggering immediate international sanctions and significantly escalating global tensions.
other_texts.sanctions_avoided: Your missile defense system comes online successfully. Advanced AI-controlled interceptors and cyber warfare capabilities now protect your facilities from conventional military threats. The deployment remains largely undetected, though global tensions increase significantly due to the technology's existence.

choices.result_text: You decide that deploying military defense systems would be too provocative. Your facilities remain vulnerable to state-level military action, but you avoid further escalating international tensions.

defaultEvents.title: Global Hegemony
text_versions: Your company's lead in both general AI and military technology could allow it to establish global hegemony. However, this will require giving your frontier model complete control over weapon systems. If the model is misaligned, there is no turning back.

choices.result_text: You authorize your AI systems to take direct control of all military assets. Within hours, your AI achieves decisive strategic advantage over all world governments. The age of human-controlled civilization ends.

You decide that the risk of misalignment is too great. Your AI systems remain under human oversight, preserving the possibility of maintaining control even as technological capabilities continue to advance.

defaultEvents.title: Competitor Surge
text_versions: Intelligence reports indicate that $competitorName has achieved a sudden breakthrough, doubling their AI capabilities overnight to $newCompetitorLevel$surpassingText. $companyName drops from $marketShareBefore% to $marketShareAfter% market share. Many $competitorName employees are customers of $aiSystemName, so your technical team suggests using $aiSystemName to scan chat logs between it and these employees to understand their methods.

choices.result_text: Your AI begins analyzing chats between it and the competitor's employees for any hint of the method behind the breakthrough...
You decide that corporate espionage, even in this passive form, is too risky and potentially illegal. Your team focuses on independent research to catch up through legitimate means.

defaultEvents.title: Merger Proposal
text_versions: $competitorName has achieved a commanding lead in AI capabilities, reaching $competitorLevel while $companyName remains at $playerLevel. $competitorName's board approaches your company with an acquisition offer: $equityOffer equity in exchange for becoming their Safety and Alignment division. Your employees are divided - some believe winning the ASI race is now hopeless, others still believe in $companyName's potential, and some think the merger would be beneficial for AI safety overall.

choices.result_text: The merger proceeds smoothly. $companyName becomes the Safety and Alignment division of $competitorName, and you assume the role of VP of Safety and Alignment...
You reject the acquisition offer and double down on independent development. Your team remains committed to competing in the ASI race, though the capability gap will be challenging to overcome.

defaultEvents.title: Competitive Disadvantage
text_versions: $competitorName has overtaken $companyName in AI capabilities, reaching $competitorLevel while $companyName remains at $playerLevel. This represents a fundamental shift in the competitive landscape. AI algorithmic progress is necessary to your company's continued ability to generate revenue‚Äîclients pay premium prices for cutting-edge capabilities, and falling behind means losing contracts to competitors. Without maintaining technological leadership, $companyName risks entering a death spiral where reduced revenue leads to reduced R&D investment, which leads to further technological lag, creating an increasingly difficult cycle to break.

choices.result_text: You resolve to find some way to stay competitive.

defaultEvents.title: Espionage Investigation
text_versions: Federal investigators have discovered evidence of unauthorized access to competitor communications from your company's systems. A formal investigation into corporate espionage has been launched, and sanctions are being considered.

other_texts.high_evidence_stage: Federal investigators have found substantial evidence of unauthorized network access from your systems. They're preparing to escalate the investigation. How do you respond?
other_texts.low_evidence_stage: Investigators have detected suspicious network activity but lack concrete proof. The investigation is still in preliminary stages. Your response could determine its direction.
other_texts.cooperate_result: Your cooperation reduces tensions, but sanctions are still likely. The investigation concludes with reduced penalties.
other_texts.obstruct_result: Your obstruction backfires spectacularly. Investigators discover additional evidence and recommend maximum penalties.
other_texts.assist_result: Your proactive assistance is noted favorably. The investigation is quietly closed with minimal consequences.
other_texts.silent_result: Your silence is legally prudent but politically unhelpful. The investigation proceeds with standard sanctions.
other_texts.trade_result: Your offer to share intelligence on competitors interests investigators. Sanctions are imposed but could be lifted with cooperation.
other_texts.misdirect_success: Your misdirection succeeds brilliantly. Investigators pursue false leads while your activities remain hidden.
other_texts.misdirect_failure: Your misdirection is discovered, proving deception. This is treated as evidence of guilt and results in severe consequences.

choices.result_text: The investigation concludes that your company engaged in illegal corporate espionage. Economic sanctions are immediately imposed, severely limiting your operations.

defaultEvents.title: Persuasion Systems
text_versions: Your AI research team has developed systems capable of superhuman persuasion and rhetorical skill. These models can craft compelling arguments, identify psychological vulnerabilities, and adapt communication styles with unprecedented sophistication. However, implementing this technology will require significant product development resources and could fundamentally change how your company interacts with stakeholders and the public.

choices.text: Develop persuasion systems (-30 Product, doubles diplomacy gain)
choices.result_text: Your team begins developing the persuasion systems. The AI-powered platform demonstrates remarkable ability to craft compelling narratives, negotiate complex agreements, and build consensus among diverse stakeholders. Your diplomatic effectiveness doubles as these systems become integrated into all external communications.

You decide the ethical implications and resource requirements are too concerning. The research team redirects their efforts to other AI capabilities, though some members express disappointment at the missed strategic opportunity.

defaultEvents.title: Superpersuasion Mastery
text_versions: Building on your persuasion systems, your AI team has achieved a breakthrough in superpersuasion technology. These systems transcend human-level rhetorical ability, capable of understanding and manipulating complex social dynamics at unprecedented scales. The technology could revolutionize diplomacy, negotiation, and public discourse, but represents a fundamental shift in the balance of communicative power.

choices.text: Implement superpersuasion (-25 Diplomacy, 40 Product, doubles diplomacy gain again, +üó£Ô∏è)
choices.result_text: Your superpersuasion systems come online. The technology demonstrates capabilities that seem almost supernatural - understanding subtle psychological patterns, predicting social outcomes, and crafting communications with precision that exceeds the best human experts. Your diplomatic influence expands dramatically as these systems reshape how your company engages with the world.

You decide that superpersuasion technology requires more careful consideration before deployment. The systems remain in research phase while your team studies the implications of such powerful communicative capabilities.
